languages.text: "Ничего, кроме досужих баек. Доводилось мне слышать легенды о кораблях-серпах, что жнут целые эскадры, как колосья злаков. Об их экипажах, не знающих страха, о вуали смерти, что окутывает их и разъедает корабли их врагов, будто ржа. Но что толку с тех рассказов, если, судя по ним же, встречи с этими кораблями-серпами не переживает никто. Откуда же тогда браться сплетням?"

"Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"
languages.original_text: "Ничего, кроме досужих баек. Доводилось мне слышать легенды о кораблях-серпах, что жнут целые эскадры, как колосья злаков. Об их экипажах, не знающих страха, о вуали смерти, что окутывает их и разъедает корабли их врагов, будто ржа. Но что толку с тех рассказов, если, судя по ним же, встречи с этими кораблями-серпами не переживает никто. Откуда же тогда браться сплетням?"

traits.locale_text: "Nothing but pastime tales. I happened to hear legends about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of rye, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes enemies' ships like rust. But what is the point of these tales if, again, according to them no one survived the encounter with the sickle ships? Where would these tales come from then?"

"Nothing but pastime tales. I happened to hear legends about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of rye, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes enemies' ships like rust. But what is the point of these tales if, again, according to them no one survived the encounter with the sickle ships? Where would these tales come from then?"

"Nothing but pastime tales. I've heard many legends — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of rye, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. But what purpose do these tales serve, if according to them none survived encountering these sickle ships? Where would these stories come from then?"

"Nothing but pastime tales. I've heard many legends — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of rye, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. But what purpose do these tales serve, if according to them none survived encountering these sickle ships? Where would these stories come from then?"

"Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"

languages.text: “我知道的只有传闻而已。我听说过很多相关的流言蜚语，关于这些镰刀一样舰船是怎么像割麦子一样消灭了整支中队，关于他们的船员有多么可怕，还有它们死亡的面纱怎么将敌人的舰船腐蚀殆尽。不过要我说，这简直是一派胡言，连个格洛克斯兽的屁都不如。因为他们还说，从来没有人能从那些镰刀舰船的手下逃脱。要是真的谁都跑不掉，那这些故事又是谁讲的？”
languages.original_text: "Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"

traits.locale_text: “我知道的只有传闻而已。我听说过很多相关的流言蜚语，关于这些镰刀一样舰船是怎么像割麦子一样消灭了整支中队，关于他们的船员有多么可怕，还有它们死亡的面纱怎么将敌人的舰船腐蚀殆尽。不过要我说，这简直是一派胡言，连个格洛克斯兽的屁都不如。因为他们还说，从来没有人能从那些镰刀舰船的手下逃脱。要是真的谁都跑不掉，那这些故事又是谁讲的？”

languages.text: « Rien de plus que des rumeurs et autres contes à dormir debout. J'ai entendu de nombreuses histoires à propos de vaisseaux en forme de faucille capables de moissonner des escadrons entiers comme autant d'épis de blé, de leurs équipages qui ne connaissent pas la peur et de leur linceul mortel qui ronge les bâtiments ennemis comme la rouille. Pour autant, ces racontars ne valent pas une fiente de grox, car tous prétendent que personne n'a jamais survécu à une rencontre avec ces engins de mort. Or, si c'était vrai, il n'y aurait personne pour témoigner, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"

traits.locale_text: « Rien de plus que des rumeurs et autres contes à dormir debout. J'ai entendu de nombreuses histoires à propos de vaisseaux en forme de faucille capables de moissonner des escadrons entiers comme autant d'épis de blé, de leurs équipages qui ne connaissent pas la peur et de leur linceul mortel qui ronge les bâtiments ennemis comme la rouille. Pour autant, ces racontars ne valent pas une fiente de grox, car tous prétendent que personne n'a jamais survécu à une rencontre avec ces engins de mort. Or, si c'était vrai, il n'y aurait personne pour témoigner, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Nur Geschichten. Ich habe schon so manche Legende gehört – über Sichelschiffe, die ganze Geschwader abernten, als wären es Roggenähren; über Crews, die nichts fürchten; über den sie umhüllenden Schleier des Todes, der die Schiffe ihrer Feinde wie Rost zerfrisst. Aber was bringen dann die Geschichten, wenn angeblich niemand eine Begegnung mit solchen Sichelschiffen überlebt? Wer könnte sie dann erzählen?"
languages.original_text: "Nothing but pastime tales. I've heard many legends — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of rye, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. But what purpose do these tales serve, if according to them none survived encountering these sickle ships? Where would these stories come from then?"

traits.locale_text: "Nur Geschichten. Ich habe schon so manche Legende gehört – über Sichelschiffe, die ganze Geschwader abernten, als wären es Roggenähren; über Crews, die nichts fürchten; über den sie umhüllenden Schleier des Todes, der die Schiffe ihrer Feinde wie Rost zerfrisst. Aber was bringen dann die Geschichten, wenn angeblich niemand eine Begegnung mit solchen Sichelschiffen überlebt? Wer könnte sie dann erzählen?"

languages.text: «Solo he oído relatos y rumores. Historias sobre naves con forma de hoz que siegan escuadrones enteros como si fueran mazorcas de trigo, sobre tripulaciones que no conocen el miedo y que están rodeadas por un velo de muerte que corroe las naves de sus enemigos como el óxido. Pero esas historias valen menos que lo que le sale del culo a un grox, porque también dicen que nadie sobrevive a un encuentro con las naves en forma de hoz. Ya. Entonces, ¿quién está contando esas historias?».
languages.original_text: "Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"

traits.locale_text: «Solo he oído relatos y rumores. Historias sobre naves con forma de hoz que siegan escuadrones enteros como si fueran mazorcas de trigo, sobre tripulaciones que no conocen el miedo y que están rodeadas por un velo de muerte que corroe las naves de sus enemigos como el óxido. Pero esas historias valen menos que lo que le sale del culo a un grox, porque también dicen que nadie sobrevive a un encuentro con las naves en forma de hoz. Ya. Entonces, ¿quién está contando esas historias?».

languages.text: 「うわさ話に噂すぎないです。穀物の穂のように中隊全体を刈り取る鎌船について、恐怖を知らない乗組員について、彼らを覆い、敵の船を錆のように腐食させる死のベールについて、色々な話しを聞いてきました。そのような話は、グロックスのケツほどの価値しかないですよ。というのも、そのような鎌船と遭遇して生き残った者はいないとも言われているんです。もしそれが本当なら、そんな噂話は周らないはずでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"

traits.locale_text: 「うわさ話に噂すぎないです。穀物の穂のように中隊全体を刈り取る鎌船について、恐怖を知らない乗組員について、彼らを覆い、敵の船を錆のように腐食させる死のベールについて、色々な話しを聞いてきました。そのような話は、グロックスのケツほどの価値しかないですよ。というのも、そのような鎌船と遭遇して生き残った者はいないとも言われているんです。もしそれが本当なら、そんな噂話は周らないはずでしょう？」

languages.text: "Hikâye ve söylentiler dışında yok. Korku nedir bilmeyen tayfaları ve orağı andıran gemileriyle koca eskadraları ekin biçer gibi biçiyor, gemilerini saran ölüm örtüsüyle kendilerini koruyup düşman gemilerini pasa çeviriyorlarmış. Bunlar hikâye tabii, groks bokundan değersizler. Çünkü güya o orak gemilerle karşılaşıp da canını kurtarabilen olmamış. Bu rivayetin aslı olsaydı hikâyeleri anlatacak kimse kalmazdı, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Nothing but tales and rumours. I've heard stories — about sickle ships that reap entire squadrons like ears of grain, about crews that know no fear, about the veil of death that shrouds them and corrodes their enemies' ships like rust. Those stories aren't worth a grox's arse, though, because they also say that none has ever survived encountering those sickle ships. If that were true, there wouldn't be anyone around to tell those stories, would there?"
